ygData.subject: Re: Stein - No more - Addendum
ygData.msgSnippet: the testament of vanear doesn t work. Sloop ... From: HiFi Review  To:  Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 3:29 PM
ygData.messageBody:
the testament of vanear doesn't work.

Sloop
----- Original Message -----
From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 3:29 PM
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] Stein - No more - Addendum


> From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
>
> Testament of Vaneer
>
> --- "Farr, Robert" <Robert.Farr@...> wrote:
> > From: "Farr, Robert" <Robert.Farr@...>
> >
> > +10 wis book in Erudin?
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: HiFi Review [SMTP:hifireview@...]

> > > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com

> > Addendum
> > >
> > > From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> > >
> > > I actually saw the updated stats at your site.
> > This doesn't solve the
> > > problem. I already have a sacrificial dagger for
> > the melee hand but I
> > > use a staff of withering most of the time. I
> > can't use another
> > > frigging blunt weapon. If they want to make the
> > quest impossible,
> > > that's fine, they can do it. But changing the
> > item so it no longer
> > > does what people put their time and money into, is
> > completely unfair.
> > > The Glowing Black Stone can go in both hands, so
> > let people use that
> > > for Melee hand if they want. I may end up
> > quitting the game over this
> > > one. They had better remove the quests for the
> > Paw of Opalla and the
> > > +10 wis book in Erudin.
> > >
> > >
> > >
> > > --- Greg Short <eq@...> wrote:
> > > > From: "Greg Short" <eq@...>
> > > >
> > > > It appears the stats have changed on Test Server
> > yet
> > > > again. Its now a 1
> > > > hand 7 / 43 1 hand blunt AS WELL as having all
> > the
> > > > glowing stein stats.
> > > >
> > > > Full details on my site - I am too lazy to
> > retype
> > > > heh.
> > > >
> > > > http://eq.castersrealm.com
> > > >
> > > > - baels

> > > > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>

> > Int
> > > > item which is now
> > > > > going to turn in to a melee-hand-only item.
> > Why
> > > > do we even play this
> > > > > game anymore? Verant is going to get a bill
> > for
> > > > my time wasted on a
> > > > > now useless item. 7/43? What a joke!
> > > > >
> > > > > Q

> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: <Baltoro@...>
> > > > > > To: <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
> > > > > > Sent: Thursday, August 19, 1999 3:04 PM
> > > > > > Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Stein
> > > > > >
> > > > > >
> > > > > > > From: Baltoro@...
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > I've done it 4 times and will do it again
> > > > twice
> > > > > > tonight. This is to
> > > > > > replace
> > > > > > > the 4 I sold or traded, will have one for
> > > > myself
> > > > > > and one for the druid who
> > > > > > is
> > > > > > > helps me gather the ingredients.
> > > > > > > The 4 steins have really raked in untold
> > > > riches,
> > > > > > by my count 4000
> > > > > > platinum, a
> > > > > > > pair of dwarven workboots, Shimmering orb,
> > the
> > > > > > list goes on and on.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > After doing it 4 times I decided to go to
> > > > kaladim
> > > > > > and see how my faction
> > > > > > > decline was progressing. I found the
> > guards
> > > > > > glowered at me dubiously
> > > > > > > including the king himself. I went out to
> > the
> > > > > > chessboard, ruins, etc and
> > > > > > > bought 90 bone chips for 1g each from the
> > > > people
> > > > > > hunting and turned them
> > > > > > in a
> > > > > > > few at a time to improve my faction.
> > After
> > > > that,
> > > > > > the king regarded me
> > > > > > > indifferently but the guards still
> > regarded me
> > > > > > dubiously. What if another
> > > > > > > new quest pops up that requires us to go
> > to
> > > > > > Kaladim? I don't want to
> > > > > > think
> > > > > > > about it. After I get the 2 steins
> > tonight I
> > > > will
> > > > > > charge 2000 platinum to
> > > > > > > complete the quest for someone provided
> > they
> > > > > > gather the ingredients
> > > > > > > themselves. For weeks i'm gonna save up
> > > > > > bonechips till I have about 300
> > > > > > and
> > > > > > > go back to turn them in if the guy deals
> > with
> > > > me
> > > > > > anymore. Hell, i'm not
> > > > > > even
> > > > > > > sure if its worth 2000 plat for the hits
> > > > > > anymore....
> > > > > > >
